comments:
Using API tools incubator plugins...

1) checked out org.eclipse.emf.ecore and org.eclipse.emf.common version 2.2.0 from dev.eclipse.org.  
2) Created API baseline of these two plugins in workspace
3) Replaced plugins with latest from HEAD
4) Performed an API comparison between 2.2.0 and HEAD.

-> This resulted in an NPE (note error is swallowed unless you apply the patch from my previous bug):

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.util.StringTokenizer.<init>(StringTokenizer.java:197)
	at org.osgi.framework.Version.<init>(Version.java:127)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.internal.VersionChecker.verify(VersionChecker.java:43)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.SnapshotOperations.compare(SnapshotOperations.java:95)
	at org.eclipse.pde.api.tools.ui.internal.dialogs.CompareApiDialog$2.run(CompareApiDialog.java:172)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run(ModalContext.java:113)

I think the scenario was slightly different: you probably had a JAR with no manifest (and hence no version) included in the comparison.

In any case, it should be fixed now.
